author: Felix Salmon
title: Why an effective quarantine is the lesser of two evils
description: We've gone on holiday by mistake. And we're going to have to stay here for a while. The big picture: During normal, scheduled holidays — the period between Christmas and New Year's, for instance, or all of August in France — GDP plunges to well below normal l…
